department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Fencing, multiple contracts of 1 year's duration. The two call off contracts shall commence on the contract award date and end on July 3, 2024. The two call off contracts, including the initial call off contracts, shall not exceed 1 bet 750000$ dollars.

full_summary:
- **Title**: W355B-234695 - Request for Proposal for Fencing Services
- **Reference**: WS4318505792-Doc4385619617
- **Amendment**: 5
- **Notice Publication Date**: March 19, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: April 18, 2024, 2:00 p.m. (EDT)
- **Amendment Date**: April 16, 2024
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
- **Expected Contract End Date**: July 03, 2024
- **Tender Status**: Expired
- **TPSAB Category Code**: 30152000 - Fencing
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (G)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Tendering
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- **Region of Delivery**: Halifax, Nova Scotia
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
- **End User**: Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
- **Contact Information**: Felix-Antoine Carignan, felix-antoine.carignan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
**Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19146381?extsite=MTkxNDYzODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for fencing services. The details as follows:

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the provision of fencing services, including the design, manufacture, and installation of various types of fencing.
The project is located in Halifax, Nova Scotia.
The PSPC is a signatory to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
This is a competitive tendering procedure with a lowest price, technically acceptable evaluation criterion.
The successful proponent will be required to provide the following:
* Design services for the fencing system
* Manufacture and delivery of the fencing materials
* Installation services for the fencing system
The PSPC reserves the right to terminate this procurement at any time.
This solicitation is issued in English.
Proposals must be submitted electronically
